import * as React from "react"; import Link from 'next/link'; import { useRouter } from 'next/router'; import { LayoutProps } from "./Layout"; const Layout: React.FunctionComponent = ({ children, }): JSX.Element => { const router = useRouter() const handleClick = e => { e.preventDefault(); let cin = document.getElementById('cinInput'); if(cin) { router.push('/company/[cin]', `/post/${cin}`); } }; return
